abstract: NFL suspends New York Giants linebacker Victor Butler without pay for first four games of regular season for violating league's policy on performance-enhancing substances.
lead_paragraph: Butler was suspended without pay for the first four games of the regular season for violating the N.F.L.’s policy on performance-enhancing substances, the league announced Friday.

headline.main: Giants Linebacker Victor Butler Is Suspended

snippet: Butler was suspended without pay for the first four games of the regular season for violating the N.F.L.’s policy on performance-enhancing substances, the league announced Friday.
